EmailTemplate.name: Lunch & Learn071216
EmailTemplate.subject: Lunch & Learn session this Tuesday, July 12th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|Doctor Evidence Lunch and Learn|*
Doctor Evidence Lunch & Learn Tuesday, July 12th 11-1 CST, Room: ABV1 - 2S-101-01
Dear {!Contact.Name}, We are pleased to invite you to the Doctor Evidence Lunch & Learn session next Tuesday, July 12th 11-1 CST, Room: ABV1 - 2S-101-01.
Doctor Evidence (DRE) is a specialty evidence-based medicine software platform and services company that is engaged with AbbVie to provide the most relevant medical evidence and related analytics to inform AbbVie’s clinical and care decisions in multiple therapeutic areas.
Learn how Doctor Evidence’s dynamic evidence-based software platforms can help you:
Review and synthesize the curated database of relevant study sets in your therapeutic area Understand what types of research these data support Perform sophisticated meta-analyses, sensitivity and sub-group analyses with ease Learn how to incorporate output from analyses into documents, evidence tables and other deliverables.
Look forward to seeing you soon,
Michael de Bruin Account Director, Client Solutions
This is an open session (walk-ins welcome and encouraged!) where we will be providing training and support on 3 of our technology resources that will be of greatest use to AbbVie associates: DOC Library, DOC Data, and DOC Label. We will also be answering questions related to any existing DRE projects as well as discussing new evidence-related needs and opportunities. We would love to see you there, so please stop by and bring your research questions! Lunch will be provided.
Visit our website
